onboarding1.title: Nosūtīt, saņemt un pārvaldīt savus IOTA līdzekļus
onboarding1.body: Firefly ir IOTA oficiālā maka programmatūra.

legal.title: Privātuma politika un Lietošanas noteikumi
legal.body: Lūdzu iepazīstieties ar Privātuma politiku un Lietošanas noteikumiem.
legal.checkbox: Esmu izlasījis un piekrītu Privātuma politikai un Lietošanas noteikumiem

profile.title: Izveido profilu
profile.body1: Jūs varat izveidot vairākus lietotāja profilus, lai pārvaldītu savus makus un uzlabotu privātumu.

body2.first: For now, let's start with your first profile name.
body2.nonFirst: For now, let's start with your profile name.

profile.addMore: You can add more profiles later.

developer.label: Developer profile
developer.info: Connect to public and private IOTA networks

setup.title: Uzstādi maku
setup.chrysalisBody: No 21. aprīļa lietotāji var pārcelt savus līdzekļus uz Chrysalis tīmekli. Mēs rekomendējam nekavēties ar Jūsu līdzekļu pārcelšanu.

secure.title: Pasargā savu maku
secure.body1: Saglabā un izprintē Recovery Kit PDF paraugu.
secure.body2: If you fill out the Recovery Kit and store it safely, you will always be able to recover your wallets.

create.title: Create a wallet
create.body: Create a new wallet. You can choose a regular software wallet or if you have a Ledger device you can set up a hardware wallet.

ledgerAccount.title: I want a hardware wallet
ledgerAccount.description: Ledger Nano S or Nano X required

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Have you installed the necessary Ledger apps?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must find and install both the {legacy} app and the new IOTA app through Ledger Live.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Make sure your Ledger firmware is up-to-date. Any pre-installed apps should be updated to their latest versions.

password.title: Create a password
password.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
password.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Set up a login PIN to make sure that only you can enter your profile.

pin.title: Set up PIN code
pin.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

confirmPin.title: Verify your PIN code
confirmPin.body1: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private.
confirmPin.body2: Re-enter your PIN code to proceed.

backup.title: Back up your wallet
backup.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backup.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backup.body3: If you lose your recovery phrase, you may lose your funds.

recoveryPhrase.title: Recovery phrase
recoveryPhrase.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
recoveryPhrase.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Verify recovery phrase
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupWallet.title: Back up to a Stronghold file
backupWallet.body1: Enter your password to backup your wallets to a Stronghold file. Your password is used to encrypt the backup.
backupWallet.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupWallet.reason1: Easily recover your wallets without typing in your recovery phrase
backupWallet.reason2: Import your wallets on other devices

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Successfully backed up
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: You have backed up your wallets to a Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Wallet setup completed
congratulations.body: Your new wallet is ready to use.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: You have successfully migrated your funds to the new network
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Your Ledger account is successfully recovered and you can now continue.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: You have successfully migrated your Ledger to the new network.
congratulations.exportMigration: Export migration log and finish setup

import.title: Recover or migrate funds
import.body: If you have an existing seed or wallet back up file, you can import it here. If you hold older network funds, you will be taken through the migration steps to move to the Chrysalis network.
import.importSeedDescription: Enter a seed and migrate funds to Chrysalis
import.importMnemonic: I have a Firefly recovery phrase
import.importMnemonicDescription: Enter your recovery phrase to recover your wallets
import.importFileDescription: Upload a Seedvault or Stronghold file
import.importLedgerDescription: Restore or migrate a Ledger profile

seed.title: Type your seed to commence migration
seed.body: A seed consists of 81 characters. This is used to recover from the older Trinity app.

mnemonic.title: Type your recovery phrase
mnemonic.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover existing Firefly wallets.

importFromFile.title: Restore your wallets using a backup file
importFromFile.body: Import a backup file to restore your wallets. Backups can either be a Stronghold (.stronghold) or a Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx).

importFromLedger.title: Restore or Migrate your Ledger
importFromLedger.body: Restore an existing Firefly Ledger profile, or migrate your funds from Trinity.
importFromLedger.haveFireflyLedger: I have a Firefly Ledger backup
importFromLedger.haveTrinityLedger: I have a Trinity Ledger backup

connectLedger.title: Connect your Ledger to Firefly
connectLedger.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Firefly, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed.
connectLedger.trafficLight1: Connect and unlock your Ledger with your PIN
connectLedger.trafficLight2: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Restore Your Ledger Profile
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Press restore to complete the setup process and restore your wallets, balances and transaction history.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Start your Ledger migration using Firefly
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly will help you to transfer your tokens to the new Chrysalis network.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: After the migration, you will be able to send and receive your tokens using your Ledger with Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: What to expect from the migration process

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Generate new address
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: You need to generate a new address to migrate your tokens with Firefly. Click the button below to continue.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: For security, please compare the address generated on your Ledger device with the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: You have confirmed that the address in Firefly matches the one on your Ledger device.

switchLedgerApps.title: Switch Ledger apps
switchLedgerApps.body: Please switch to the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue migration. When ready, press continue.

selectLedgerAccountIndex.title: Choose Ledger account index
selectLedgerAccountIndex.body: Choose the Ledger account index you used with Trinity. For most users this will be the default index of 0.
selectLedgerAccountIndex.reinstallLegacy: If not, disconnect the device and try again. If the issue persists, you may need to reinstall the {legacy} app.

importBackupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

importSuccess.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
importSuccess.body: You can now set up your new profile.

migrate.title: Migrate your funds
migrate.body1: This is an automated process to transfer your funds to your new wallet.
migrate.body2: It may take some time. Do not turn off your device during the migration.
migrate.noAddressesForMigration: Please select the addresses you wish to secure.
migrate.noDataSeedVault: No data could be found in the SeedVault.
migrate.problemRestoringWallet: There was a network error restoring your wallet. Please try again.
migrate.minimumMigrationAmountSpentAddresses: The minimum migration amount for each spent address is 1 Mi. Check again if your balance doesn't look right.
migrate.tooManyAddressesToMigrate: You have too many addresses with a low balance to migrate. Check again if your total balance doesn't look right.
migrate.cannotMigrateAllYourFunds: We cannot migrate all of your funds because some addresses are too low in value. You can proceed anyway. {value} will be lost.
migrate.error: There was an error migrating your funds. Please try again.

bundleMiningWarning.title: Warning
bundleMiningWarning.body1: You have funds on one or more spent addresses.
bundleMiningWarning.body2: We recommend you run an automated process to help secure and transfer these funds safely.
bundleMiningWarning.body3: If you close the app you will need to restart the whole migration.

secureSpentAddresses.title: Secure spent addresses
secureSpentAddresses.body1: You have funds detected on {number, plural, one {# spent address} other {# spent addresses}}.
secureSpentAddresses.body2: We recommend you run an automated process to help secure and transfer your funds safely.
secureSpentAddresses.error: You can’t migrate spent addresses with less than 1 Mi

securityCheckCompleted.title: Security check completed
securityCheckCompleted.body1: We have calculated the security risk level. Running this process again may lower your risk level.
securityCheckCompleted.body2: When you are happy with the risk level(s) press continue.

securingSpentAddresses.title: Securing spent addresses...
securingSpentAddresses.body1: This process will take {minutes, plural, one {1 minute} other {# minutes}}.
securingSpentAddresses.body2: Your computer will run at full capacity, you may wish to do something else while you wait for this to complete.

transferFragmentedFunds.body1: Firefly will now proceed to migrate your funds. This may take a while.
transferFragmentedFunds.body2: Ensure your Ledger is connected and the {legacy} app is open at all times during migration.

balance.title: Your balance
balance.body: Make sure your balance is correct before continuing. You can check again if things don't look correct.
balance.error: The minimum migration amount is 1 Mi. Check again if your balance doesn't look right.
balance.zeroBalance: Try checking again. If you still can't find your balance you might have entered your seed incorrectly.
balance.zeroBalanceLedgerLegacy: Try checking again. If you still can't find your balance you might have selected the wrong account index.

generalSettings.title: General Settings
generalSettings.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

security.title: Security
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advancedSettings.title: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Help & Information
helpAndInfo.description: Find the answer to a question or get help with an issue

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Change your profile name or set an avatar

theme.title: Theme
theme.advice: Restart the Firefly application for changes to the system theme to take effect

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Adjusts balance conversion and updates chart options

networkStatus.title: Network status
networkStatus.description: Displays the status of the node you are currently connected to

exportStronghold.title: Export backup
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallets and latest transaction history

appLock.title: Automatic lock
appLock.description: Inactivity time before your wallets lock and you are logged out

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallets. You must use a strong password to protect your funds

changePincode.title: Change PIN code
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

balanceFinder.title: Balance finder
balanceFinder.description: Perform an extended search of your addresses for tokens

hiddenAccounts.title: Hidden wallets
hiddenAccounts.description: Selecting this options will show wallets that were previously hidden

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire profile, wallets and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup

deepLinks.title: IOTA links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking an IOTA link

networkConfiguration.title: Network config

description.dev: Your network settings will update automatically according to the current node configuration (switching networks will result in resetting the wallet state)
description.nonDev: Your network settings will update automatically according to the current node configuration

networkConfiguration.resetWallet: Your wallet state has been reset.

nodeConfiguration.title: Node selection
nodeConfiguration.description: Select "Manual" to configure node settings and connect to your own node(s)

configureNodeList.title: Node configuration
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes you connect to
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, unable to connect to the network
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: There are no nodes, automatic selection will be used instead

proofOfWork.title: Proof of work
proofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

errorLog.title: Error log
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

transactionHistory.title: Transaction history
transactionHistory.description: Export the transaction history of your accounts as .csv files

troubleshoot.title: Troubleshoot
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported

login.pleaseWait: Please wait {time, plural, one {1 second} other {# seconds}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 incorrect attempt} other {# incorrect attempts}}

strongholdBackup.title: Wallet Backup
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago

password.title: Password required
password.subtitle: Please enter your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

version.title: Current version: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: You are running the latest and safest version of Firefly.
version.noAutoUpdate: Auto-update is disabled in this Windows version, please go to https://firefly.iota.org to download the update.

backup.title: Last backup: {date}
backup.backupDescription: It is important to back up regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history.
backup.backupWarning: If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: You have not backed up your wallets

deleteAccount.title: Delete {name}?
deleteAccount.body: This wallet has no transaction history. It can safely be deleted.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: You cannot delete this wallet, you must have at least one.

hideAccount.title: Hide {name}?
hideAccount.body: You can find this wallet later by enabling "Show hidden wallets" in Advanced Settings.
hideAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
hideAccount.errorBody1: To hide a wallet it must have 0 balance.
hideAccount.errorBody2: You currently have {balance} remaining on this wallet. Please move these funds to a different wallet and try again.
hideAccount.errorBody3: You cannot hide this wallet, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this node?
node.removeAllConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all nodes?

switchNetwork.title: Switch network
switchNetwork.resetWarning: Changing networks will log you out and reset all accounts, balances, and transaction history for this profile.
switchNetwork.typePassword: Type your password to switch to:

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

balanceFinder.title: Balance finder
balanceFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances. This may take a while.
balanceFinder.typePassword: Type your password to allow searching.

riskFunds.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
riskFunds.body1: It is strongly recommended that you secure all your funds before proceeding with migration. Your funds are at risk of theft if you do not secure them.
riskFunds.body2: It is recommended that you rerun the process for addresses with a medium risk level or above.

missingBundle.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
missingBundle.body: You have funds on spent addresses, but the information needed to secure them was not found. This can happen if you made transactions a long time ago. You can proceed but {value} are at risk during migration.

snapshot.title: Ongoing network upgrade
snapshot.body: The Chrysalis network upgrade has begun.
snapshot.bodyMigration: Migration is disabled until it is complete.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: Firefly is disabled until it is complete. Token migration will still be possible afterwards.

ledgerNotConnected.connect: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger device to continue
ledgerNotConnected.connectLegacy: Open the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: To proceed, confirm the prompt displayed on your Ledger device

ledgerAppGuide.title: Guide to installing the Ledger apps

steps.0: Install and open the Ledger Live application
steps.1: Ensure that your Ledger is connected
steps.4: Remember that it's important to close Ledger Live before returning to Firefly

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

steps.0: Make sure Ledger Live is not open on your computer
steps.1: Ensure you have unlocked your Ledger device with your PIN
steps.2: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger device

3.link: Try the official Ledger support page

remainderAddress.title: Confirm remainder address
remainderAddress.info: Confirm that the remainder address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

transaction.title: Confirm transaction
transaction.info: Confirm that the transaction information displayed on your Ledger device matches the information displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

ledgerAddress.title: Confirm receive address
ledgerAddress.body: Confirm that the receive address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

ledgerMigrateIndex.title: Do you need to migrate another Trinity account index?
ledgerMigrateIndex.body: You can also migrate later in Advanced Settings.

exportTransactionHistory.title: Export transaction history
exportTransactionHistory.body: Export your transaction history for all accounts consecutively within this profile. Exports will be in a CSV format.
exportTransactionHistory.typePassword: Type your password to allow exporting

actions.restoreWalletDescription: Migrate to Chrysalis or restore an existing wallet
actions.createWalletDescription: Create a fresh wallet running on Chrysalis
actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: I’ve written down my recovery phrase

general.scanQrOrPaste: Scan a QR code or paste an Address
general.noAccounts: You have no wallets, please create one.
general.firstSync: Syncing history, this may take a while...
general.accountRemoved: This wallet is hidden. Unhide it to perform transfers.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# month} other {# months}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# year} other {# years}} ago

notifications.updateError: An error occurred during the update, please try again
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}
notifications.fundsAvailableSoon: Your funds will become available shortly

exportTransactionHistory.success: Transaction history for {accountAlias} was successfully saved to {filePath}
exportTransactionHistory.error: Unable to export transaction history for {accountAlias}

deepLinkingRequest.recievedWhileLoggedOut: Please login to initiate the IOTA link
deepLinkingRequest.invalidFormat: The IOTA link you followed is invalid

send.success: Payment details added from IOTA link

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.word: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your wallet name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest wallet before creating a new one.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this wallet.
account.duplicate: A wallet with this name already exists.
account.tilde: A profile name can't start with the '~' character.
account.control: A profile name can't contain a control character.
account.startDot: A profile name can't start with the '.' character.
account.chars: A profile name can't contain the following characters <>:"/\|?*
account.index: Your account index must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.page: Your account page must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.syncing: There was an error syncing your wallets.

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.
send.wrongAddressFormat: The address is not correctly formatted.
send.noToAccount: You have not selected a wallet to send the funds to.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.
send.transaction: There was an error sending your transaction. Please try again.

node.dns: Could not find DNS resolution for node.
node.handshake: Could not complete handshake with node.
node.invalidCertificate: Could not connect with invalid certificate.
node.https: HTTPS is required; insecure connections over HTTP are not supported at this time.
node.duplicate: This node has already been added.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.
node.answer: Failed to get an answer from all nodes.

network.mismatch: The network ID for this node is "{networkId}", which does not match the current network.
network.notReachable: The network ID for this node could not be retrieved, unable to add node.
network.badNodes: Unable to connect to the network with current node configuration.
network.nonEmptyAccount: You must transfer all balances before switching networks.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
backup.phraseCaseWord: The word "{word}" should be lower case

ledger.appNotOpen: You must open the IOTA app on your Ledger device.
ledger.generic: There was an error connecting to your Ledger device.
ledger.legacyConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.locked: Please unlock your Ledger device by entering the PIN.
ledger.mnemonicMismatch: You have connected the wrong Ledger device or the mnemonic has changed.
ledger.otherConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.generateAddress: There was an error generating an address.

popup.preventClose: This popup is unable to be closed.

migration.missingBundle: An error occurred while trying to find the transaction bundle.

crypto.cannotDecodeBech32: Unable to decode string as Bech32 address.

node.http: Using nodes over HTTP leaves traffic unencrypted and could pose a security risk.
